This is a former member of Talinum, which is actually more closely related to the genus Portulaca and Cactaceae than it is to most other Portulaceae (in the historical sense). WTD is a best guess, but it matches what I know about the phylogeny and my field experience--I had this species in  my Phd work in the Ozarks.
